name: A Tale of the Slime Kingdom
name_original: A Tale of the Slime Kingdom
description:
The Slime Kingdom

The Slime Kingdom is a place where the red, blue and green slimes used to live peacefully together. But a conflict between the different-colored slimes arose. This conflict evolved into a disastrous war.
The only one who can save the kingdom from destruction is a little slime who feels suppressed by his parents.

Your Journey
  • This game is a platforming adventure centered around the slimes' ability to increase and decrease his size to solve puzzles.
  • Discover the Slime Kingdom's various places like the Slime Forest, the Sawmill and the Slime Mountain on your journey.
  • Meet interesting slimes like the generals of the red, blue and green armies.
  • A 1-2h long adventure(don't worry, there is a saving system in place in case you need a break)

This is a story about war. More importantly, this is a story about family disputes. But most importantly, this is a story about slimes.
